I love to help my sister with her business, but I'm not so great at keeping up with my appearance.

content.text: Hey, I'm doing well! What about you?
I'm doing great, thanks! I just finished a big project at work, and I'm feeling really proud of myself.
That's awesome! What kind of work do you do?
I'm a translator, and I just finished translating a long and complex document.
Wow, that sounds really challenging! I'm impressed.
Thanks! It was a lot of work, but it was worth it.
What do you like most about being a translator?
I love learning about new cultures and languages. It's so interesting to see how different people express themselves in different ways.
That's a great perspective! I've never thought about it that way.
Yeah, it's really cool. I'm also glad that my job allows me to be creative. I love coming up with new ways to express the meaning of a text.
That sounds really rewarding. I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks! I'm really lucky to have such a great job.
So what are your plans for the future?
I'm not sure yet. I'm still trying to figure out what I want to do next.
Well, good luck! I'm sure you'll figure it out.
